QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: takeoffDist
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance between VTOL Takeoff and Climbout Waypoint.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: takeoffHeading
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Heading from Takeoff to First waypoint.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: loiterClockwise
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Loiter clockwise around the final approach point.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: useLoiterToAlt
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Use a loiter to altitude item for final appoach. Otherwise use a regular waypoint.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: gradient
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The gradient between the vtol takeoff and Climbout Waypoint point.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: transitionDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: ground distance to complete a transition.
